actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-486.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.J. Res. 404, joint resolution making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1980, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives certain points of order in the consideration of the conference report on H.J. Res. 404 (Continuing appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.J. Res. 404, joint resolution making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1980, and for other purposes.
